title: Saturn Transit in the 7th House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Saturn transits the 7th house for Libra ascendant, relationships, marriage, and partnerships undergo serious evaluation. Commitments demand responsibility, patience, and realistic expectations. Superficial connections weaken, while mature, long-term bonds are tested and strengthened. Business partnerships require clear structure and accountability. Delays or distance may appear in relationships, but Saturn aims to establish stability through honesty and endurance. Avoid rigidity or emotional withdrawal, as balanced effort sustains mutual trust.

sections.heading: Business & Agreements
points: Partnerships require clear rules and roles

closing: This transit refines relationships through responsibility. When patience and fairness guide effort, Saturn builds partnerships that endure time.
